scripts.install:all: npm run install:ahmad_khoja && npm run install:ali_osseily && npm run install:amr_gharz && npm run install:anas_jamous && npm run install:anthony_nakhle && npm run install:bayan_mawed && npm run install:fadi_moubassaleh && npm run install:hampig_mazakian && npm run install:jad_azar && npm run install:mitza_haddad && npm run install:nagham_ramadan && npm run install:saleh_saadi && npm run install:souad_ali
scripts.update: git submodule update --recursive --remote && npm run install:all
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,fadi,hampig,jad,mitza,nagham,saleh,souad "npm run ahmad_khoja" "npm run ali_osseily" "npm run amr_gharz" "npm run anas_jamous" "npm run anthony_nakhle" "npm run bayan_mawed" "npm run fadi_moubassaleh" "npm run hampig_mazakian" "npm run jad_azar" "npm run nagham_ramadan" "npm run saleh_saadi" "npm run souad_ali"
